web_snippets: Michael Olson is a Tier 1 Canada Research Chair in Molecular Cell Biology, in the Department of Chemistry and Biology at Toronto Metropolitan University.
Michael Olson is a Teaching Associate Professor of Philosophy and Director of the Marquette Core Curriculum at Marquette University in Milwaukee, Wisconsin.
